column2: [This.Founder.GetBestName] seduced enough pawns into their bed to earn the attention and favor of powerful sex-crazed demons.
[GetLilithName] is pleased that her faithful child is so seductive. She is willing to enhance your lineage. It would not be a wise idea to turn her offer down.
The current number of people you have bedded with Demonnic Seduction before bedding [From.GetFirstName] is §Y[Root.lilith_seduction.GetValue]§!.
A neighbor of ours is a long-hated enemy. It's time to wipe them off the map.
This character has zero interest in sex.
A full-blooded demon, this character is a child of [GetLilithName].
A full-blooded demon, this character is a child of [GetLilithName].
A half-blooded demon, this character is descended from [GetLilithName].

My dreams have often been dark, with whispers of calling out to me, tempting me with worldly delights. I often awake in bed, drenched in a cold sweat. 
  Tonight seems to be different though, the dream is more real. I feel the warmth of the room, the eyes of the demonic courtiers gazing upon me as I walk towards a figure lazily lying upon an altar. She is unlike any other woman I've seen. Beautiful, smooth skin, a pair of horns curling from her forehead, and a tail that lazily flips back and forth. 
  She smiles at me and licks her lips. A wave of blissful serenity washes over me as she beckons for me to approach her. 
  I somehow find a moment of clarity and ask "Who are you?" A sultry smile crosses the beautiful woman's lips. "You know who I am child. I'm [GetLilithName], your mother." 
  I feel my heartbeat quicken as my blood responds to her words. I proceed forward, and [GetLilithName] sits upright on the altar, spreading her arms open to greet me. 
  "That's it my child. Come, let your mother embrace you and awaken the power within you."

She is unlike any other woman I've seen. Beautiful, smooth skin, a pair of horns curling from her forehead, and a tail that lazily flips back and forth. 
  She smiles at me and licks her lips. A wave of blissful serenity washes over me as she beckons for me to approach her. 
  I somehow find a moment of clarity and ask, "Who are you?" A sultry smile crosses the beautiful woman's lips. "You know who I am child. I'm [GetLilithName], your mother." 
  I feel my heartbeat quicken as my blood responds to her words. I proceed forward, and [GetLilithName] sits upright on the altar, spreading her arms open to greet me. Even her tail seems to beckon me forth. 
  "That's it my child. Come, let your mother embrace you and awaken the power within you."
